About Me

Get to know me better

A full-stack web and mobile developer passionate about crafting seamless, user-centric digital experiences. With expertise in frontend frameworks (React, Flutter) and backend technologies, I build responsive websites and performant apps that blend clean design with intuitive functionality. My focus extends beyond code, I prioritize accessibility, performance optimization, and data-driven decisions to solve real problems. Whether architecting scalable systems or refining UI micro-interactions, I thrive on turning complex requirements into elegant solutions. Committed to lifelong learning, I stay at the forefront of emerging tech to deliver products that are both impactful and enjoyable to use.

Let's create something extraordinary together. I believe in technology that not only functions flawlessly but also tells a story and creates connections. Every line of code I write is driven by the desire to build digital experiences that are meaningful, memorable, and make people's lives just a little bit better. I approach each project as a unique opportunity to blend technical precision with creative problem solving, ensuring solutions that are innovative as they are reliable. Through collaborative development and user focused design, I strive to build digital products that don't just meet expectations, but redefine them.

Let's code !!!

Featured Projects

Some of my recent work

Live Link GitHub

Expenses Measurer

A responsive personal finance web app that helps users track and analyze spending habits. Built with React.js, Chart.js, and CSS3, it features expense categorization, interactive data visualization, and local storage persistence. The clean UI allows users to add, edit, or delete transactions while viewing spending patterns through dynamic charts. Deployed on Vercel, this project demonstrates strong skills in data handling, state management, and user-centric design. Future enhancements could include Firebase integration for cloud sync and budget alerts.

React Chart.js Node.js MongoDB Vite
GitHub

E-commerce Platform

A complete e-commerce platform built with MERN stack focusing for electronic goods, built with modern web technologies. The store offers smooth product browsing with category filters, a secure shopping cart, and easy checkout process. Sellers can manage their inventory through a simple dashboard, while customers enjoy a clean shopping experience across phones, tablets, and computers. The system handles user accounts, order tracking, and secure payments without complicated processes. Everything runs fast and stays organized behind the scenes.

Html css css Node.js MongoDB
GitHub

Company Product Analysis

This data analytics project compares sales performance between beverage industry leaders using Kaggle datasets. Advanced visualization techniques reveal key differences in regional market penetration, seasonal demand patterns, and pricing strategies. The analysis demonstrates Coca-Cola's brand loyalty dominance against Pepsi's competitive pricing advantages in emerging markets. Interactive dashboards present these insights through clean visual storytelling of complex sales data relationships.

powerbi Python R
